code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../App.css';import{Sidebar}from'../components/sidebar';import{Dashboard}from'./dashboard';import{RequestPending}from'./pendingRequest';import LeaveHistory from'./LeaveHistory';import{CalendarPage}from'./calendar';import{Profile}from'./profile';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Main(_ref){let{setlogin}=_ref;let[user,setUser]=useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')));const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const[active,setActive]=useState('Dashboard');let[profile,setProfile]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{active:active,setActive:setActive,isOpen:isOpen,setIsOpen:setIsOpen,setUser:setlogin}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[profile&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Profile,{setUser:setlogin}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profilebutton-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setProfile(e=>!e),className:"admin-header-profile",children:"\uD83D\uDC64"})}),active==='History'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LeaveHistory,{user:user}):active==='Dashboard'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{user:user,setActive:setActive}):active==='Calendar'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CalendarPage,{user:user}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RequestPending,{user:user})]})]});}export default Main;
